text: Leonardo Luiz dos Santos (born 3 June 1994), simply known as Léo, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Ituano as a defender. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=9 align="center"|Ituano |2012 |rowspan=2|Paulista |colspan="2"|—||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||13All appearance(s) in Copa Paulista||0||13||0 |- |2013 |colspan="2"|—||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||4||0||4||0 |- |2014 |Série D |7||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||7||0 |- |2015 |Paulista |colspan="2"|—||15||1||7||0||colspan="2"|—||10||4||32||5 |- |2016 |rowspan=2|Série D |7||0||8||2||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||5||0||20||2 |- |2017 |6||1||2||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||11||1 |- |2018 |Paulista |colspan="2"|—||15||1||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||16||1 |- |2019 |Série D |colspan="2"|—||10||2||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||10||2 |- !colspan="2"|Subtotal !20!!1!!50!!6!!8!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!32!!4!!32!!4 |- |align="center"|Ponte Preta |2018 |Série B |16||2||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||16||2 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !36!!3!!50!!6!!8!!0!!0!!0!!32!!4!!48!!6 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Ituano FC players Category:Associação Atlética Ponte Preta players
